product.description: Delivering the performance of the world's best road bikes in a flat-bar, urban-friendly form, Vita redefines the notion of versatility. The Vita Pro has a lightweight carbon frame with Women's Endurance Geometry, plus Zertz for a fast and efficient ride. The 2x10 Shimano Ultegra drivetrain is lightweight and provides flawless shifting.

bullets.bullet: FACT IS constructed frame, Women's Endurance Geometry, and Zertz delivers the performance of a high-end road bike in a flat bar package
FACT carbon fork with Zertz for a quick, responsive road feel and forgiving ride
Significantly lighter than comparable-level wheelsets, tough AXIS 2.0 wheels roll smooth and fast
Women's Body Geometry Contour grips help alleviate hand pain and tingling fingers; with integrated bar ends for changing hand position
Shimano Ultegra drivetrain coupled with compact alloy crankset for smooth, efficient shifting
Body Geometry Riva Comp Women's saddle features generous padding for all-day performance and comfort

specs.stem: STEM Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt, 4-position adjustable, 31.8mm clamp

specs.tape: TAPE Specialized Body Geometry Women's Contour, lock-on w/ integrated bar end

product.description: Delivering the performance of the world's best road bikes in a flat-bar, urban-friendly form, Vita redefines the notion of versatility. The Vita Comp has a lightweight carbon frame with Women's Endurance Geometry and Zertz for a fast and efficient ride. The 2x10 FSA/Tiagra drivetrain is lightweight and provides flawless shifting.

bullets.bullet: FACT IS constructed frame, Women's Endurance Geometry, and Zertz delivers the performance of a high-end road bike in a flat bar package
FACT carbon fork with Zertz for a quick, responsive road feel and forgiving ride
Double BlackBelt protection and 23c profile make Specialized Espoir Sport tyres reliable and fast on city streets
FSA Gossamer crankset, Shimano Tiagra drivetrain, 10-speed cassette, with dual-pull front derailleur for spot-on shifting every time
Women's Body Geometry Contour grips help alleviate hand pain and tingling fingers; with integrated bar ends for changing hand position
Body Geometry Riva Comp Women's saddle features generous padding for all-day performance and comfort

product.description: The Vita Elite combines the speed of a road bike with the comfort and confidence that comes from a flat bar, whether you're exercising, commuting, or hitting the open road. A super-light E5 alloy frame and carbon fork, disc brakes for confident and reliable stopping power, plus 9-speed Shimano compact drivetrain, delivers smooth, fast, and efficient performance. To help get you ready for your first adventure, the EQ comes equipped with two alloy Zee cages and a Mini-Wedgie seat bag.

bullets.bullet: Super light, women's fully-manipulated E5 Premium Aluminium frame with Fitness Geometry is built for high speed, low fuss, and great versatility, with internal routing, rack/fender mounts, and wide tyre clearance
Disc fork with alloy crown and Cr-Mo steerer for a quick, responsive road feel and forgiving ride
Body Geometry Riva Women's saddle features generous padding for all-day performance and comfort
Women's Body Geometry Contour grips help alleviate hand pain and tingling fingers; compatible with integrated bar ends for changing hand position
Tektro Draco hydraulic disc brakes with dual pistons and women's shorter reach levers ensure precision braking and fit
FSA Tempo crank and 9-speed drivetrain provides gearing for any terrain and any load, with precise, reliable action
Two colour-matched alloy Zee cages and a matching Mini-Wedgie seat bag for a bike that is ready for any ride, right out of the box

skus.sku: 82914-4201 VITA ELITE DISC EQ PRL WHT/PUR XS

product.description: The Vita Sport combines the speed of a road bike with the comfort and confidence that comes from a flat bar, whether you're exercising, commuting, or hitting the open road. The 9-speed Shimano triple drivetrain delivers smooth, reliable shifting and offers a wide range of gearing.

bullets.bullet: Women's A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Fitness Geometry and integrated headset offers a great ride and versatility, with rack/fender mounts and wide tyre clearance
Alloy fork with alloy crown and Cr-Mo steerer for a quick, responsive road feel and forgiving ride
Flak Jacket protection and a grooved tread make the Specialized Nimbus tyres perfect for city or open road use
SR Suntour crankset, Shimano Acera front and 9-speed rear derailleur, plus EZ Fire Plus shifters for wide-range gearing and spot-on shifting
Body Geometry Riva Women's saddle features generous padding for all-day performance and comfort

product.description: The Vita combines the speed of a road bike with the comfort and confidence that comes from a flat bar, whether you're exercising, commuting, or hitting the open road. The Shimano 8-speed gearing delivers reliable performance, whatever your ride throws at you.

bullets.bullet: Women's A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Fitness Geometry and integrated headset offers a great ride and versatility, with rack/fender mounts and wide tyre clearance
Straight blade steel fork with fender mounts gives you all the durability you need to manage potholes and rough roads
Flak Jacket protection and a grooved tread make the Specialized Nimbus tyres perfect for city or open road use
Shimano Altus triple crankset with Shimano Altus rear derailleur for smooth, trouble-free shifting, plus chainguard for peace of mind
Women's Body Geometry Contour grips help alleviate hand pain and tingling fingers; compatible with integrated bar ends for changing hand position
Body Geometry Riva Women's saddle features generous padding for all-day performance and comfort
